mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_experiences (student_user_id, project_name, role, project_link, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{studentUserId}, #{projectName}, #{role}, #{projectLink}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE project_experiences SET project_name = #{projectName}, role = #{role}, project_link = #{projectLink}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id} AND student_user_id = #{studentUserId}
